body.p:
Richmond Ky
June 11" 1863
J W Tate Esq
Sir

I have this day Enclosed to his excellency the Gov of the State a petition of Mr M Stone to have a forfeited bond remitted -- The facts are set forth in his petition, which you will see are sufficient, and signed by a few of our best union men & most respectable citizens. Mr Stone only appealed to those who have signed it, deeming it unnecessary to obtain any more signatures -- I write this private note to you to ask as a special favor to me that you call the attention of the Gov to it immediately -- & if he remits it we want the remitter
forwarded immediately in order we may file it on the call of the case which will be on the 22d inst the day our June Term Commences
Forward the remitter to me & your immediate attention to this matter will much oblige
